item.title: Metal Militia: DragonForce, Isis and Hatebreed.
item.description: I love metal. Seriously. I love it. And metal concerts are always full of the most interesting experiences. However - the last couple shows I have been to I haven't really been into it. I remember back in the day when Matiss and I went to go see Dimmu Borgir and how awesome it was.  But lately I haven't really been into the whole scene. So I decided to try it out again.
